about_the_game:
AI: Art Impostor is the brand new party AI drawing game that you can play with 3-8 players online and enjoy cross-platform play between Android, iOS, and PC!

You and other AI artists are collaborating for a new exhibition…
But one of you is an impostor that doesn't know the exhibition theme.
Find out who the impostor is. Or if it's you, fake it 'til you make it!

Simple Rules

- A theme is chosen at random.

- The theme is shown to the real artists, but not to the impostor!
- Each player uses the AI to make drawings and shows them to the other players.
- Finally, players vote on who is the impostor.
- If the impostor is caught, the artists win!
- BUT if the impostor can guess the theme, then the impostor wins!!

Groundbreaking Gameplay

Have you ever tried a game where you can play with AI-generated art?

Now is your chance to try it out!

No Need For Artistic Talent

All you need to do is to give the AI a few words or a short sentence related to the theme.

Then the AI will generate completely unique art for you.
You don't need to have aesthetic taste or an artistic background.
Sometimes AI-generated arts look weird and strange, but that's a form of art, too.

Cross-Play with Other Players

You can play this game with strangers around the world or with your friends via Room ID.

Your friends don't have a computer? No problem. You can play this game on a smartphone too.

Short Game Time

It only takes around 5 minutes to play one match.

Play anytime! You can always sneak in one more round.

Low System Requirement

This game doesn't require an expensive high-spec computer to play.

You may be able to play this game on an old computer stored in a closet.

Customizability

Choose avatars and styles to stand out in the game!

※There are two types of items that can be purchased with the in-game currency and the ones purchasable with the In-App Purchase currency.
※Currently, the Steam edition doesn't support In-App Purchase and we'll add this feature in a future update.

AI: Art Impostor is the brand new party AI drawing game that you can play with 3-8 players online and enjoy cross-platform play between Android, iOS, and PC!

You and other AI artists are collaborating for a new exhibition…

name: AI: Art Impostor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10, 8
  • Processor: Dual Core 3Ghz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.1 capable GPU with 512 MB VRAM - GeForce GTX 260, Radeon HD 4850 or Intel HD Graphics 5500
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: AI: Art Impostor is an AI drawing party game for 3-8 players. You are a progressive artist who commands AI to generate images, and you don't need aesthetic talent to draw good artwork. It only takes 5 mins to play, and multiplayer between Steam, Android, and iOS is supported!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
